A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The average age Star Wars is trying to appeal to has dropped by about 10 years. It's desperate to inject comedy where it doesn't belong\, exaggerates the power Jedis have\, and uses ridiculously implausible resolutions to problems the protagonists face. Is saved by a few entertaining scenes and the fact that Kylo Ren and Rey become intriguing characters.\n\nI can't imagine how anyone but kids who just got into Star Wars would enjoy this.
